scripts.build:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev npm run clean && parcel build src/lib/export-dev.ts --out-file floorplan --no-minify
scripts.build:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=prod npm run clean && parcel build src/lib/export-prod.ts --no-source-maps --out-file floorplan
scripts.build:prod:no-minify: cross-env NODE_ENV=prod npm run clean && parcel build src/lib/export-prod.ts --no-minify --out-file floorplan
scripts.build:demo: cross-env NODE_ENV=demo npm run clean && parcel build src/public/index.html --public-url ./
